channel.title: Adding NPC's around my world?
channel.description: Hello. I have recently started coding a server. I knew how to do almost all of it awhile ago, but I shut down my server 3 years ago. Now I don't remember most of it, but still, I want to try. Can someone please let me know how I can add NPC's to my world, like Shops, and Monsters to train on. Please let me know. Thanks.

item.title: Adding NPC's around my world?
item.dc:creator: @Sup22211 Sup22211
item.description:
@Sup22211 wrote:

You forgot to add that
spawn =

Read full topic

item.title: Adding NPC's around my world?
item.dc:creator: @GodexCAB GodexCAB
item.description:
@GodexCAB wrote:

I still need a little bit of help. I uploaded a video to youtube. [youtube]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=TUkDWeNPiIk[/youtube]

Could someone copy there file that has the spawned NPC’s and give me it? I’ll give you some credits on my server. Thanks.

Read full topic

item.title: Adding NPC's around my world?

item.description:
@system wrote:

Okay, so…
Open the file.
Add:

Use the tab button to do the spaces. Otherwise you’ll get errors.

item.title: Adding NPC's around my world?
item.dc:creator: @JavaLearner JavaLearner
item.description:
@JavaLearner wrote:

// npc spawnX spawnY height walk maxhit attack defence description /* Home Spawns */ spawn = 1152 3083 3506 0 0 0 0 0 Barrow Repair Man

I’m sure you’re aware that if you don’t have anything to actually read the inside of your cfg file, it is going to be quite useless.

Read full topic

item.title: Adding NPC's around my world?
item.dc:creator: @GodexCAB GodexCAB
item.description:
@GodexCAB wrote:

[quote=“JavaLearner, post:2, topic:515493”]I’m sorry, but if you actually knew all of it back then, then I’m surprised you even forgot the slightest things…

Anyway, spawn-config.cfg…

Please don’t make multiple threads about the same topic.[/quote]

I’m sorry about not remembering, and for posting multiple times. When I go to my CFG folder it is empty. Hmm… :
Could you copy part of the code and paste it here on a comment so I can make the code please?

Read full topic
